Poll Everywhere is hiring an SRE and DevOps engineer.

We're always looking for really strong rails back-end developers and front-end JS developers.

If you want to dive deep into D3.js, we have a position open where you'd work mostly on our live visualizations.

All of that at https://www.polleverywhere.com/jobs. Reply here if you have questions or email brad at poll everywhere dot com.
